title: Blood Press. & Cholesterol | 2 of 2
question_text:
The two-way table above summarizes data about the occurrences of two medical measurements, blood pressure (BP) and cholesterol level, for $53$ individuals who were measured at the infirmary of a large steel mill as part of their annual check-up.
Which of the following Venn diagrams is an accurate display of the data if the circles represent normal blood pressure and normal cholesterol?
tables:
High BP (HBP)Normal BP (NBP)
High Cholesterol (HC)1311
Normal Cholesterol (NC)821

choices.text: None of the listed responses is correct.
